metadata.feature_description: Configure text editor type (Plain Text or Rich WYSIWYG) for content creation in Answers, Discussions, Ideas, and Social Events modules.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Answers module to Rich editor

steps.expected: Community Settings panel opens with Enable WYSIWYG section visible
steps.actual: Community Settings panel opened successfully showing Enable WYSIWYG checkboxes

steps.action: Click Answers checkbox to enable Rich WYSIWYG editor
steps.actual: Answers checkbox is now checked, enabling Rich WYSIWYG editor

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Answers module to Plain Text editor

steps.action: Click Answers checkbox to disable Rich WYSIWYG editor
steps.actual: Answers checkbox is now unchecked, setting editor to Plain Text mode

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Discussions module to Plain Text editor

steps.action: Click Discussions checkbox to disable Rich WYSIWYG editor
steps.actual: Discussions checkbox is now unchecked, setting editor to Plain Text mode

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Discussions module to Rich editor

steps.action: Click Discussions checkbox to enable Rich WYSIWYG editor
steps.actual: Discussions checkbox is now checked, enabling Rich WYSIWYG editor

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Ideas module to Plain Text editor

steps.action: Click Ideas checkbox to disable Rich WYSIWYG editor
steps.actual: Ideas checkbox is now unchecked, setting editor to Plain Text mode

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Ideas module to Rich editor

steps.action: Click Ideas checkbox to enable Rich WYSIWYG editor
steps.actual: Ideas checkbox is now checked, enabling Rich WYSIWYG editor

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Social Events module to Plain Text editor

steps.action: Click Social Events checkbox to disable Rich WYSIWYG editor
steps.actual: Social Events checkbox is now unchecked, setting editor to Plain Text mode

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Social Events module to Rich editor

steps.action: Click Social Events checkbox to enable Rich WYSIWYG editor
steps.actual: Social Events checkbox is now checked, enabling Rich WYSIWYG editor

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save all editor settings and verify persistence

steps.action: Click Save button to persist settings
steps.expected: Settings are saved with success notification
steps.actual: Save button clicked, success notification 'Item successfully saved' appeared

steps.action: Close and re-open Community Settings panel
steps.expected: Settings should persist after panel is re-opened
steps.actual: Panel re-opened and settings persisted correctly: Answers=unchecked, Discussions=checked, Ideas=checked, Social Events=checked

observations: The Enable WYSIWYG section uses checkboxes where checked=Rich WYSIWYG (value 1) and unchecked=Plain Text (value 0)
Default values for new installations could not be verified as the test environment already had existing settings
The feature works correctly for all four modules: Answers, Discussions, Ideas, and Social Events
Settings are persisted to the database via the SaveSettings API endpoint in CommunitySettingsController
